details.description: The "license" link relation can be used to associate licenses with a feed or entry. Feeds and entries can be dual-licensed by including multiple "license" link relations specifying different href attribute values. If multiple "license" link relations are specified, each SHOULD contain a title attribute specifying a human-readable label for the license.
The license keyword indicates that the referenced document provides the copyright license terms under which the main content of the current document is provided.
